junk text that the parser should skip {
	"glossary": {
		"title": "example glossary",
		"GlossDiv": {
			"title": "S",
			"GlossList": [{
                "ID": "SGML",
                "SortAs": "SGML",
                "GlossTerm": "Standard Generalized Markup Language",
                "Acronym": "SGML",
                "Abbrev": "ISO 8879:1986",
                "GlossDef": 
"A meta-markup language, used to create markup languages such as DocBook.",
                "GlossSeeAlso": ["GML", "XML", "markup"]
            }]
        }
    }
}

-- contains arrays
-- contains strings
-- contains arrays nested inside objects
-- contains objects nested inside arrays
-- contains multiple types of white space (tabs, newlines, and spaces
-- contains arrays with only 1 element
-- contains objects with only 1 element
